mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACM_SYS_ROLE( ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_DESC, IS_FILED, ROLE_STATUS, OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{id}, #{roleName}, #{roleDesc}, #{isFiled}, #{roleStatus}, #{operator}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, ROLE_NAME as roleName, ROLE_DESC as roleDesc, IS_FILED as isFiled, ROLE_STATUS as roleStatus, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM ACM_SYS_ROLE c WHERE c.ID=#{id}

SELECT c.ID as id, ROLE_NAME as roleName, ROLE_DESC as roleDesc, IS_FILED as isFiled, ROLE_STATUS as roleStatus, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM ACM_SYS_ROLE c ORDER BY createTime DESC limit #{page.pageSize} offset #{page.offset}

SELECT c.ID as id, ROLE_NAME as roleName, ROLE_DESC as roleDesc, IS_FILED as isFiled, ROLE_STATUS as roleStatus, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM ACM_SYS_ROLE c ORDER BY createTime
